mapper.insert: insert into yuyi_evaluate_users (first_name, login, password, role_id,img) values (#{first_name},#{login},#{password},#{role_id},#{url})
mapper.select: select count(*) from yuyi_evaluate_users where login = #{login}
mapper.update: update yuyi_evaluate_users set password = #{password} where id =#{id}
update yuyi_evaluate_users set first_name = #{first_name},role_id={role_id} where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select t.id,t.name,t.description from yuyi_evaluate_user_roles t where t.is_system ='0'
